name: bulbasaur
english_flavor_text: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this POKéMON.

name: ivysaur
english_flavor_text: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.

name: venusaur
english_flavor_text: The plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.

name: charmander
english_flavor_text: Obviously prefers hot places. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

name: charmeleon
english_flavor_text: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the temperature to unbearably high levels.

name: charizard
english_flavor_text: Spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. Known to cause forest fires unintentionally.

name: squirtle
english_flavor_text: Shoots water at prey while in the water. Withdraws into its shell when in danger.

name: wartortle
english_flavor_text: When tapped, this POKéMON will pull in its head, but its tail will still stick out a little bit.

name: blastoise
english_flavor_text: It deliberately makes itself heavy so it can with­ stand the recoil of the water jets it fires.

name: caterpie
english_flavor_text: It releases a stench from its red antenna to repel enemies. It grows by molting repeatedly.

name: metapod
english_flavor_text: This POKéMON is vulnerable to attack while its shell is soft, exposing its weak and tender body.

name: butterfree
english_flavor_text: In battle, it flaps its wings at high speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.

name: weedle
english_flavor_text: Often found in forests, eating leaves. It has a sharp venomous stinger on its head.

name: kakuna
english_flavor_text: Almost incapable of moving, this POKéMON can only harden its shell to protect itself from predators.

name: beedrill
english_flavor_text: Flies at high speed and attacks using its large venomous stingers on its forelegs and tail.

name: pidgey
english_flavor_text: A common sight in forests and woods. It flaps its wings at ground level to kick up blinding sand.

name: pidgeotto
english_flavor_text: Very protective of its sprawling territorial area, this POKéMON will fiercely peck at any intruder.

name: pidgeot
english_flavor_text: When hunting, it skims the surface of water at high speed to pick off unwary prey such as MAGIKARP.

name: rattata
english_flavor_text: Bites anything when it attacks. Small and very quick, it is a common sight in many places.

name: raticate
english_flavor_text: It uses its whis­ kers to maintain its balance. It apparently slows down if they are cut off.

name: spearow
english_flavor_text: Eats bugs in grassy areas. It has to flap its short wings at high speed to stay airborne.

name: fearow
english_flavor_text: With its huge and magnificent wings, it can keep aloft without ever having to land for rest.

name: ekans
english_flavor_text: Moves silently and stealthily. Eats the eggs of birds, such as PIDGEY and SPEAROW, whole.

name: arbok
english_flavor_text: It is rumored that the ferocious warning markings on its belly differ from area to area.

name: pikachu
english_flavor_text: When several of these POKéMON gather, their electricity could build and cause lightning storms.

name: raichu
english_flavor_text: Its tail discharges electricity into the ground, protecting it from getting shocked.

name: sandshrew
english_flavor_text: Burrows deep underground in arid locations far from water. It only emerges to hunt for food.

name: sandslash
english_flavor_text: Curls up into a spiny ball when threatened. It can roll while curled up to attack or escape.

name: nidoran-f
english_flavor_text: Although small, its venomous barbs render this POKéMON dangerous. The female has smaller horns.

name: nidorina
english_flavor_text: The female's horn develops slowly. Prefers physical attacks such as clawing and biting.

name: nidoqueen
english_flavor_text: Its hard scales provide strong protection. It uses its hefty bulk to execute powerful moves.

name: nidoran-m
english_flavor_text: Stiffens its ears to sense danger. The larger its horns, the more powerful its secreted venom.

name: nidorino
english_flavor_text: An aggressive POKéMON that is quick to attack. The horn on its head secretes a powerful venom.

name: nidoking
english_flavor_text: One swing of its mighty tail can snap a telephone pole as if it were a matchstick.

name: clefairy
english_flavor_text: Its magical and cute appeal has many admirers. It is rare and found only in certain areas.

name: clefable
english_flavor_text: A timid fairy POKéMON that is rarely seen. It will run and hide the moment it senses people.

name: vulpix
english_flavor_text: At the time of birth, it has just one tail. The tail splits from its tip as it grows older.

name: ninetales
english_flavor_text: Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of its many tails could result in a 1000-year curse.

name: jigglypuff
english_flavor_text: When its huge eyes light up, it sings a mysteriously soothing melody that lulls its enemies to sleep.

name: wigglytuff
english_flavor_text: The body is soft and rubbery. When angered, it will suck in air and inflate itself to an enormous size.

name: zubat
english_flavor_text: Forms colonies in perpetually dark places. Uses ultrasonic waves to identify and approach targets.

name: golbat
english_flavor_text: Once it strikes, it will not stop draining energy from the victim even if it gets too heavy to fly.

name: oddish
english_flavor_text: During the day, it keeps its face buried in the ground. At night, it wanders around sowing its seeds.

name: gloom
english_flavor_text: It secretes a sticky, drool-like honey. Although sweet, it smells too repulsive to get very close.

name: vileplume
english_flavor_text: It has the world's largest petals. With every step, the petals shake out heavy clouds of toxic pollen.

name: paras
english_flavor_text: Burrows to suck tree roots. The mushrooms on its back grow by draw­ ing nutrients from the bug host.

name: parasect
english_flavor_text: A host-parasite pair in which the parasite mushroom has taken over the host bug. Prefers damp places.

name: venonat
english_flavor_text: Lives in the shadows of tall trees where it eats insects. It is attracted by light at night.

name: venomoth
english_flavor_text: The dust-like scales covering its wings are color coded to indicate the kinds of poison it has.

name: diglett
english_flavor_text: Lives about one yard underground where it feeds on plant roots. It sometimes appears above ground.

name: dugtrio
english_flavor_text: A team of DIGLETT triplets. It triggers huge earthquakes by burrowing 60 miles underground.

name: meowth
english_flavor_text: Adores circular objects. Wanders the streets on a nightly basis to look for dropped loose change.

name: persian
english_flavor_text: Although its fur has many admirers, it is tough to raise as a pet because of its fickle meanness.

name: psyduck
english_flavor_text: While lulling its enemies with its vacant look, this wily POKéMON will use psychokinetic powers.

name: golduck
english_flavor_text: Often seen swim­ ming elegantly by lake shores. It is often mistaken for the Japanese monster, Kappa.

name: mankey
english_flavor_text: Extremely quick to anger. It could be docile one moment then thrashing away the next instant.

name: primeape
english_flavor_text: Always furious and tenacious to boot. It will not abandon chasing its quarry until it is caught.

name: growlithe
english_flavor_text: Very protective of its territory. It will bark and bite to repel intruders from its space.

name: arcanine
english_flavor_text: A POKéMON that has been admired since the past for its beauty. It runs agilely as if on wings.

name: poliwag
english_flavor_text: Its newly grown legs prevent it from running. It appears to prefer swimming than trying to stand.

name: poliwhirl
english_flavor_text: Capable of living in or out of water. When out of water, it sweats to keep its body slimy.

name: poliwrath
english_flavor_text: An adept swimmer at both the front crawl and breast stroke. Easily overtakes the best human swimmers.

name: abra
english_flavor_text: Using its ability to read minds, it will identify impending danger and TELEPORT to safety.

name: kadabra
english_flavor_text: It emits special alpha waves from its body that induce headaches just by being close by.

name: alakazam
english_flavor_text: Its brain can out­ perform a super­ computer. Its intelligence quotient is said to be 5,000.

name: machop
english_flavor_text: Loves to build its muscles. It trains in all styles of martial arts to become even stronger.

name: machoke
english_flavor_text: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power save belt to be able to regulate its motions.

name: machamp
english_flavor_text: Using its heavy muscles, it throws powerful punches that can send the victim clear over the horizon.

name: bellsprout
english_flavor_text: Even though its body is extremely skinny, it is blindingly fast when catching its prey.

name: weepinbell
english_flavor_text: It spits out POISONPOWDER to immobilize the enemy and then finishes it with a spray of ACID.

name: victreebel
english_flavor_text: Said to live in huge colonies deep in jungles, although no one has ever returned from there.

name: tentacool
english_flavor_text: Drifts in shallow seas. Anglers who hook them by accident are often punished by its stinging acid.

name: tentacruel
english_flavor_text: The tentacles are normally kept short. On hunts, they are extended to ensnare and immobilize prey.

name: geodude
english_flavor_text: Found in fields and mountains. Mistaking them for boulders, people often step or trip on them.

name: graveler
english_flavor_text: Rolls down slopes to move. It rolls over any obstacle without slowing or changing its direction.

name: golem
english_flavor_text: Its boulder-like body is extremely hard. It can easily withstand dynamite blasts without damage.

name: ponyta
english_flavor_text: Its hooves are 10 times harder than diamonds. It can trample anything completely flat in little time.

name: rapidash
english_flavor_text: Very competitive, this POKéMON will chase anything that moves fast in the hopes of racing it.

name: slowpoke
english_flavor_text: Incredibly slow and dopey. It takes 5 seconds for it to feel pain when under attack.

name: slowbro
english_flavor_text: The SHELLDER that is latched onto SLOWPOKE's tail is said to feed on the host's left over scraps.

name: magnemite
english_flavor_text: Uses anti-gravity to stay suspended. Appears without warning and uses THUNDER WAVE and similar moves.

name: magneton
english_flavor_text: Formed by several MAGNEMITEs linked together. They frequently appear when sunspots flare up.

name: farfetchd
english_flavor_text: The sprig of green onions it holds is its weapon. It is used much like a metal sword.

name: doduo
english_flavor_text: A bird that makes up for its poor flying with its fast foot speed. Leaves giant footprints.

name: dodrio
english_flavor_text: Uses its three brains to execute complex plans. While two heads sleep, one head stays awake.

name: seel
english_flavor_text: The protruding horn on its head is very hard. It is used for bashing through thick ice.

name: dewgong
english_flavor_text: Stores thermal energy in its body. Swims at a steady 8 knots even in intensely cold waters.

name: grimer
english_flavor_text: Appears in filthy areas. Thrives by sucking up polluted sludge that is pumped out of factories.

name: muk
english_flavor_text: Thickly covered with a filthy, vile sludge. It is so toxic, even its footprints contain poison.

name: shellder
english_flavor_text: Its hard shell repels any kind of attack. It is vulnerable only when its shell is open.

name: cloyster
english_flavor_text: CLOYSTER that live in seas with harsh tidal currents grow large, sharp spikes on their shells.

name: gastly
english_flavor_text: Almost invisible, this gaseous POKéMON cloaks the target and puts it to sleep without notice.

name: haunter
english_flavor_text: Because of its ability to slip through block walls, it is said to be from an­ other dimension.

name: gengar
english_flavor_text: Under a full moon, this POKéMON likes to mimic the shadows of people and laugh at their fright.

name: onix
english_flavor_text: As it grows, the stone portions of its body harden to become similar to a diamond, but colored black.

name: drowzee
english_flavor_text: Puts enemies to sleep then eats their dreams. Occasionally gets sick from eating bad dreams.

name: hypno
english_flavor_text: When it locks eyes with an enemy, it will use a mix of PSI moves such as HYPNOSIS and CONFUSION.

name: krabby
english_flavor_text: Its pincers are not only powerful weapons, they are used for balance when walking sideways.

name: kingler
english_flavor_text: The large pincer has 10000 hp of crushing power. However, its huge size makes it unwieldy to use.

name: voltorb
english_flavor_text: Usually found in power plants. Easily mistaken for a POKé BALL, they have zapped many people.

name: electrode
english_flavor_text: It stores electric energy under very high pressure. It often explodes with little or no provocation.

name: exeggcute
english_flavor_text: Often mistaken for eggs. When disturbed, they quickly gather and attack in swarms.

name: exeggutor
english_flavor_text: Legend has it that on rare occasions, one of its heads will drop off and continue on as an EXEGGCUTE.

name: cubone
english_flavor_text: Because it never removes its skull helmet, no one has ever seen this POKéMON's real face.

name: marowak
english_flavor_text: The bone it holds is its key weapon. It throws the bone skillfully like a boomerang to KO targets.

name: hitmonlee
english_flavor_text: When in a hurry, its legs lengthen progressively. It runs smoothly with extra long, loping strides.

name: hitmonchan
english_flavor_text: While apparently doing nothing, it fires punches in lightning fast volleys that are impossible to see.

name: lickitung
english_flavor_text: Its tongue can be extended like a chameleon's. It leaves a tingling sensation when it licks enemies.

name: koffing
english_flavor_text: Because it stores several kinds of toxic gases in its body, it is prone to exploding without warning.

name: weezing
english_flavor_text: Where two kinds of poison gases meet, 2 KOFFINGs can fuse into a WEEZING over many years.

name: rhyhorn
english_flavor_text: Its massive bones are 1000 times harder than human bones. It can easily knock a trailer flying.

name: rhydon
english_flavor_text: Protected by an armor-like hide, it is capable of living in molten lava of 3,600 degrees.

name: chansey
english_flavor_text: A rare and elusive POKéMON that is said to bring happiness to those who manage to get it.

name: tangela
english_flavor_text: The whole body is swathed with wide vines that are similar to sea­ weed. Its vines shake as it walks.

name: kangaskhan
english_flavor_text: The infant rarely ventures out of its mother's protective pouch until it is 3 years old.

name: horsea
english_flavor_text: Known to shoot down flying bugs with precision blasts of ink from the surface of the water.

name: seadra
english_flavor_text: Capable of swim­ ming backwards by rapidly flapping its wing-like pectoral fins and stout tail.

name: goldeen
english_flavor_text: Its tail fin billows like an elegant ballroom dress, giving it the nickname of the Water Queen.

name: seaking
english_flavor_text: In the autumn spawning season, they can be seen swimming power­ fully up rivers and creeks.

name: staryu
english_flavor_text: An enigmatic POKéMON that can effortlessly regenerate any appendage it loses in battle.

name: starmie
english_flavor_text: Its central core glows with the seven colors of the rainbow. Some people value the core as a gem.

name: mr-mime
english_flavor_text: If interrupted while it is miming, it will slap around the offender with its broad hands.

name: scyther
english_flavor_text: With ninja-like agility and speed, it can create the illusion that there is more than one.

name: jynx
english_flavor_text: Its cries sound like human speech. However, it is impossible to tell what it is trying to say.

name: electabuzz
english_flavor_text: Normally found near power plants, they can wander away and cause major blackouts in cities.

name: magmar
english_flavor_text: Its body always burns with an orange glow that enables it to hide perfectly among flames.

name: pinsir
english_flavor_text: If it fails to crush the victim in its pincers, it will swing it around and toss it hard.

name: tauros
english_flavor_text: When it targets an enemy, it charges furiously while whipping its body with its long tails.

name: magikarp
english_flavor_text: In the distant past, it was somewhat stronger than the horribly weak descendants that exist today.

name: gyarados
english_flavor_text: Rarely seen in the wild. Huge and vicious, it is capable of destroying entire cities in a rage.

name: lapras
english_flavor_text: A POKéMON that has been over­ hunted almost to extinction. It can ferry people across the water.

name: ditto
english_flavor_text: It can freely recombine its own cellular structure to transform into other life-forms.

name: eevee
english_flavor_text: Its genetic code is irregular. It may mutate if it is exposed to radiation from element STONEs.

name: vaporeon
english_flavor_text: Lives close to water. Its long tail is ridged with a fin which is often mistaken for a mermaid's.

name: jolteon
english_flavor_text: It accumulates negative ions in the atmosphere to blast out 10000- volt lightning bolts.

name: flareon
english_flavor_text: When storing thermal energy in its body, its temperature could soar to over 1600 degrees.

name: porygon
english_flavor_text: A POKéMON that consists entirely of programming code. Capable of moving freely in cyberspace.

name: omanyte
english_flavor_text: Although long extinct, in rare cases, it can be genetically resurrected from fossils.

name: omastar
english_flavor_text: Apparently, it cracked SHELLDER's shell with its sharp fangs and sucked out the insides.

name: kabuto
english_flavor_text: A POKéMON that was resurrected from a fossil found in what was once the ocean floor eons ago.

name: kabutops
english_flavor_text: Its sleek shape is perfect for swim­ ming. It slashes prey with its claws and drains the body fluids.

name: aerodactyl
english_flavor_text: A ferocious, pre­ historic POKéMON that goes for the enemy's throat with its serrated saw-like fangs.

name: snorlax
english_flavor_text: Very lazy. Just eats and sleeps. As its rotund bulk builds, it becomes steadily more slothful.

name: articuno
english_flavor_text: A legendary bird POKéMON that is said to appear to doomed people who are lost in icy mountains.

name: zapdos
english_flavor_text: A legendary bird POKéMON that is said to appear from clouds while dropping enormous lightning bolts.

name: moltres
english_flavor_text: It is said to be the legendary bird Pokémon of fire. Every flap of its wings creates a dazzling flare of flames.

name: dratini
english_flavor_text: Long considered a mythical POKéMON until recently when a small colony was found living underwater.

name: dragonair
english_flavor_text: A mystical POKéMON that exudes a gentle aura. Has the ability to change climate conditions.

name: dragonite
english_flavor_text: An extremely rarely seen marine POKéMON. Its intelligence is said to match that of humans.
